Description: Ostracon bearing 3 lines of Greek. Receipt for poll tax.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (392591) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/392591)
Almásy-Martin and Duttenhöfer 2019 / Greek tax receipts from Abydos in the British Museum (no.5, 90-91)
